title: S4 Ep6: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 3 – A Series of Unfortunate Events
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 3 – A Series of Unfortunate Events
description:
September 26, 2019 / Rebecca Lavoie hosts with guests Susan Simpson, Rabia Chaudry, and Celeste Trusty, discussing episode 3 of the series and the strange happenings on the Heron farm.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
 
Today’s addendum has been sponsored by Perfect Snacks, Mejuri, and Quip.
